metadata.title: USN-4305-1 -- ICU vulnerability
metadata.description: Andr√© Bargull discovered that ICU incorrectly handled certain strings. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4305-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  icu-devtools - 55.1-7ubuntu0.5 libicu55 - 55.1-7ubuntu0.5 libicu-dev - 55.1-7ubuntu0.5 icu-doc - 55.1-7ubuntu0.5 No subscription required
